description: Number of fixed n-celled self-avoiding polygons on square lattice.
comments: Translations, rotations and reflections are not allowed.
references: I. G. Enting and A. J. Guttmann, On the area of square lattice polygons, J. Statist. Phys., 58 (1990), 475-484.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: I. Jensen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..42 (from link below)

author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Simon Plouffe_
